original_title: Scandal & Beauty: Mark Gatiss on Aubrey Beardsley
overview: Mark Gatiss explores the life and career of Aubrey Beardsley, an artist who wielded outrage as adroitly as his pen. A lifelong fan, Mark shows how Beardsley was more than just a genius of self-promotion who scandalised the art world of the 1890s. He was also a technological innovator, whose uncompromising attitude still feels remarkably modern.
title: Scandal & Beauty: Mark Gatiss on Aubrey Beardsley
